parameters.name: DefenseScene
parameters.description:
The scenario in which the protection template is used.

*   **waf_group**: basic protection.
*   **antiscan**: scan protection.
*   **ip_blacklist**: IP address blacklist.
*   **custom_acl**: custom rule.
*   **whitelist**: whitelist.
*   **region_block**: region blacklist.
*   **custom_response**: custom response.
*   **cc**: HTTP flood protection.
*   **tamperproof**: website tamper-proofing.
*   **dlp**: data leakage prevention.

parameters.name: DefenseSubScene
parameters.description:
The sub-scenario in which the protection template is used. Valid values:

*   **web**: bot management for website protection.
*   **app**: bot management for app protection.
*   **basic**: bot management for basic protection.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the Web Application Firewall (WAF) instance.

> You can call the [DescribeInstance](~~433756~~) operation to query the ID of the WAF instance.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region in which the WAF instance is deployed. Valid values:

*   **cn-hangzhou**: Chinese mainland.
*   **ap-southeast-1**: outside the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: Resource
parameters.description:
The name of the protected object or protected object group.

>  If you specify ResourceType, you must specify this parameter.

parameters.name: ResourceManagerResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud resource group.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the protected resource. Valid values:

*   **single**: protected object. This is the default value.
*   **group**: protected object group.

>  If you specify Resource, you must specify this parameter.

parameters.name: TemplateId
parameters.description: The ID of the protection template.

parameters.name: TemplateIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the protection templates that you want to query. Separate multiple template IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: TemplateName
parameters.description: The name of the protection template.

parameters.name: TemplateType
parameters.description:
The type of the protection template. Valid values:

*   **user_default**: default template.
*   **user_custom**: custom template.
